mapper.select: select id, code, value, create_time, update_time from yjcycc_lottery.sys_parameter where id = #{id} limit 1
select id, code, value, create_time, update_time from yjcycc_lottery.sys_parameter where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into yjcycc_lottery.sys_parameter(code, value, create_time, update_time) values (#{code}, #{value}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update yjcycc_lottery.sys_parameter
code = #{code},
value = #{value},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from yjcycc_lottery.sys_parameter where id in (${ids})
